data.meta_description: Pooja Sharma with her stellar performance has gained a widespread popularity in the Bhojpuri Cinema. Pooja Sharma Film List & Boyfriend Name.
data.text:
Pooja Sharma has stormed the Bhojpuri Cinema with her acting prowess. She is a famous singer. She enjoys a huge fan following in Bhojpuri cinema for her acting in all India, specially in East UP, Bihar and abroad. The very proficient and beautiful, Pooja Sharma’s bio is given below.
